author: Eugene Mayevski
comment: A marvelous application. I would change the way units are chosen (I'd use a dropdown list instead of current selector for easier selection of the needed option), but otherwise it's great.  And don't read that review saying the app isn't installed on the device -- this is a glitch of Android Wear and not of the app itself.

author: Jacques C
comment: Great app! I guess the only thing I wish it had was the ability to enable/disable certain units/categories.

author: Ian McClellan
comment: Should have a way to set favorites or at least remember the last unit you needed to convert without scrolling through every unit every time.

author: Olusola Abiodun
comment: Very great app. It will convert almost any unit you can think of.

author: Cristian Hernandez
comment: Does not show up on my apps in android wear

reply.author: Intulon LLC
reply.content:
Please ensure you watch is connected via bluetooth to your phone, then uninstall and re-install the app.
You should see Unit converter app on your Wear device.

title: Looks good but can't use it
